name: The Little Poucets
description:
IMPORTANT REMARK: if you play the WebGL version, avoid using  Firefox. The game has audio sync issues in this browser. Works best on Chromium / Chrome. 

Try to find your way back home, after your inattentive parents got you, your brothers and sisters lost in the wood!

Be careful, many dangers are out there. Wolves, hallucinating (despite delicious) mushrooms, and hunger!

This game is an entry for the Juice Jam II.

Authors:
- Double Sept: development and assets
- Scriptopathe: music, sfx and development
- Proïd: development and assets
- MonsterCrunch: development and artworks
- Knarfux: development and assets
- LaJack: development and assets

Special thanks:
- Kenney (Character, and fonts)
- The Godot engine team!!

Soundtrack:
